item.title: Klipsch USA
item.description: Klipsch USA Klipsch is a legend in American audio. They use the LouderVoice Review & Rate Tool on all of their product pages.

item.title: Castlemartyr Resort
item.description: Castlemartyr Resort Castlemartyr Resort is a 5-star hotel in Ireland. They use the LouderVoice Review & Rate Tool to show reviews from their guests.

item.title: Puddleducks
item.description: Puddleducks Puddleducks is an award winning online vendor of waterproof clothing for all the family. They use the LouderVoice API for a fully-custom implementation.

item.title: Parcel 2 Ship
item.description: Parcel2Ship Parcel 2 Ship is a UK based provider of courier and delivery services. They use the LouderVoice Review & Rate Tool to show reviews by their customers of each of their services.

item.title: Holiday Homes Direct
item.description: Holiday Homes Direct Holiday Homes Direct uses the LouderVoice Review & Rate Tool. All of the properties on their site can now be reviewed by those who stay in them
